response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be a significant asset for you. Considering its true worth and your anticipated use, I am offering this exceptional item to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and your expected utility. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and beneficial for your needs.", "product_price": 12000}
